SELECT T.TM_ID PK_COL , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY T.TM_ID ASC) RNUM , T.TM_ID , TO_CHAR(T.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , T.CRTR , TO_CHAR(T.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , T.MDFYR , T.USE_YN , T.DEL_YN , T.TM_NM , TO_CHAR(T.TM_CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TM_CRT_DT , T.DEP_ID , T.TM_HD_ID , D.DEP_NM DEP_NM , E.L_NM TM_MBR_L_NM , E.F_NM TM_MBR_F_NM , TM_HD_EMP.L_NM TM_HD_L_NM , TM_HD_EMP.F_NM TM_HD_F_NM FROM TM T INNER JOIN DEP D ON T.DEP_ID = D.DEP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_MBR M ON T.TM_ID = M.TM_ID FULL OUTER JOIN EMP E ON M.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP TM_HD_EMP ON T.TM_HD_ID = TM_HD_EMP.EMP_ID WHERE T.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T.TM_ID , TO_CHAR(T.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , T.CRTR , TO_CHAR(T.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , T.MDFYR , T.USE_YN , T.DEL_YN , T.TM_NM , TO_CHAR(T.TM_CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TM_CRT_DT , T.DEP_ID , T.TM_HD_ID , D.DEP_NM , E.EMP_ID , E.F_NM , E.L_NM , E.BRTHDY , E.EML , E.PHN , E.PSTN_PRD FROM TM T INNER JOIN DEP D ON T.DEP_ID = D.DEP_ID INNER JOIN TM_MBR M ON T.TM_ID = M.TM_ID INNER JOIN EMP E ON M.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID WHERE T.TM_ID = #{_parameter} AND T.DEL_YN = 'N'
